title: قبل كأس العالم.. أبو ريدة يساند منتخب مصر للناشئين
summary: حضر هاني أبو ريدة، رئيس الاتحاد المصري لكرة القدم، مران منتخب مصر تحت 17 عامًا قبل خوض منافسات كأس العالم المقرر إقامتها في قطر.

title: Full-size tank simulator setup now even crazier after being built into a 'tactical vehicle' with full-size replica machine gun and cannon
summary: The crown prince of extreme sim build-outs released a video showcasing his wild Tank Simulator 5, which comes with a full-size replica machine gun and cannons, on the Chinese video-sharing platform Bilibili.

title: MSI Pro MP165 E6 Portable Monitor review: Budget-friendly, average performance
summary: The MSI Pro MP165 E6 is competitive with other sub-$100 portable monitors, without any frills or special features.

title: The Outer Worlds with ray tracing can't hit 60FPS at paltry 540p resolution with an RTX 5090 and 9800X3D - ray tracing 'performance' mirrors Borderlands 4 fiasco
summary: YouTubers have discovered terrible performance on The Outer Worlds 2, so much so that the game's maximum settings with ray tracing can only be run at below 60 FPS at a 540p internal resolution on an RTX 5090.

title: The internet was born this week in 1969, and immediately glitched — only two of the five letters in the first computer-to-computer message were received
summary: The foundations of internet communications were set 56 years ago, when 'LO' was transmitted from UCLA to SRI on the ARPANET.

title: روقا يحصل على حكم ضد الزمالك بـ 5 ملايين جنيه (مستند)

title: لاتخاذ اللازم.. الأعلى للإعلام يحيل شكوى الزمالك ضد مجلة الأهلي للجنة المختصة

title: AMD’s latest Adrenalin driver update drops Windows 10 from release notes, but the company says support continues
summary: The company says Windows 10 users can still install the Adrenalin Edition 25.10.2 drivers via the Windows 11 installer, even as Microsoft’s older OS officially moves into end-of-life status.

title: Microwave repurposed into slick custom All-in-One PC — door serves as display,  motherboard rotates on the turntable, and Stream Deck used for keypad
